dict.acceptation: 粗略地；大体上；大致上；粗暴地；

sent.orig: They are best imagined as roughly the size of your hand.
sent.trans: 它们的大小最好想象成大约与你的手一样大。

sent.orig: Over the past century, the GWP has grown roughly18-fold in price-adjusted terms.
sent.trans: 过去一个世纪以来，经过物价的飞涨，GWP就已经成长了18倍。

sent.orig: The oven was made of a roughly built cube of fire-bricks.
sent.trans: 烤箱是用做工粗糙的近似立方形的耐火砖做的。

sent.orig: Twenty loads would take roughly five hours.
This is very roughly sketch for my first concept.
sent.trans: 这是一张很粗糟的想法和构图。
